Name: Video
Description: A video of a TV episode, film, or other types of media that can be watched online.

Properties.Name: Expires
Properties.Description: When access to this video will cease.

Properties.Name: Service
Properties.Description: The service upon which this video is hosted.

Properties.Name: Video of
Properties.Description: The TV episode, film, etc. that this is a video of.

Properties.Name: Video Type
Properties.Description: The "type" of video this is (whether it's the full content, or just a clip, etc.)

Properties.Name: Weblink
Properties.Description: The web address where this video can be seen.
